topic_category.zh: 議程分類：Gemini AI 的生成式實踐
topic_category.en: Category: Generative Practices of Gemini AI

bio.zh: 大家好，我是 Simon 劉育維，過去曾擔任過電信業的資深工程師和 在軟體業擔任客戶技術成功工程師，幫助各大知名企業進行機器學習、深度學習、大型語言模型等人工智慧議題進行人工智慧架構規劃的討論，目前在 Medium 上已經公開超過百篇技術文章，我希望能夠嘗試使用 AI 做應用，幫助客戶用 AI 解決痛點。
bio.en: Hello everyone, I'm Simon Liu. I have served as a senior engineer in the telecommunications industry and as a customer technical success engineer in the software industry, helping major well-known companies discuss AI architecture planning for topics such as machine learning, deep learning, and large language models. I have published over a hundred technical articles on Medium. I hope to try to use AI for applications and help customers solve their pain points with AI.

name.zh: 建構 AI Agent：結合 Google Gemini 與 ADK 工具來解放企業生產力
name.en: Building AI Agents: Combining Google Gemini and ADK Tools to Unleash Enterprise Productivity

abstract.zh:
透過 Google 一系列的平台工具，讓大家可以從過去的想像，變成現在實際的樣貌，你可以在這個議程中了解到：
1. 透過 Google Stitch 了解到如何進行 UI/UX 的規劃
2. 透過 Google Firebase Studio 來進行平台建置，並且說明如何進行修改
abstract.en:
Through a series of Google platform tools, everyone can turn past imaginations into present realities. In this session, you will learn about:
1. How to plan UI/UX through Google Stitch
2. How to build a platform through Google Firebase Studio, and how to modify it
